member.name: T:IgnorantPersistence.Memory.MemoryTable`1
member.summary: An in-memory representation of a queryable table.
member.remarks: Note this contains object references so if the object is retrieved and updated, the changes will take effect immediately within the Table. This is different from remote persistent storage system such as a RDBMS.
